description:
Nergal decides that to keep the Nadesico crew happy, they`re going to give them a new captain! And what better way to pick one than to hold a talent contest? Yurika agrees, and everyone gets excited about the chance to show off. Everyone that is, except Ryoko, who wonders whether she has any other talents besides fighting and killing.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: You`re the Next "Captain" of the Nadesico!
